page.title: 06TRAGO MILLS,STOVER.
page.content: This is classed as a hypermarket,but it is also registered as a zoo.It is unusual because it has been developed by one man, Mr Robertson. He started the business ten years ago selling 'bankrupt' stock in a large wooden building, in the middle of disused sand pits. He is now a millionaire and the site is transformed into an area of natural beauty.{Trago Mills}leases twenty five shops situated outside of the main shopping building. Together they sell everything from carpet and furniture to clothes, tropical fish and toys. The services available range from a clairvoyant to plaster restoration work. It also has a large garden centre. The main buildings are surrounded by trees and lakes that have been carefully developed so the building is hidden.The lakes, specially aerated,are teeming with
